cards.name: Nissa, Voice of Zendikar
cards.text:

[−2]: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
[−7]: You gain X life and draw X cards, where X is the number of lands you control.

foreignData.name: ゼンディカーの代弁者、ニッサ

＋１：緑の０/１の植物・クリーチャー・トークンを１体戦場に出す。
－２：あなたがコントロールする各クリーチャーの上に＋１/＋１カウンターをそれぞれ１個置く。
－７：あなたはＸ点のライフを得てカードをＸ枚引く。Ｘはあなたがコントロールする土地の総数に等しい。
foreignData.type: プレインズウォーカー — ニッサ

cards.name: Abundance
cards.text: If you would draw a card, you may instead choose land or nonland and reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.

rulings.text: This replacement effect replaces the draw, so nothing that triggers on a draw will trigger.

If you use this on a multi-card draw, each replaced draw is handled separately. In other words, you reveal and then put on the bottom of the library for the first card, then do the same for the second, and so on. In a multi-card draw you do not have to choose how many of those draws will be replaced before you do any drawing or use of this card.
If no card of the chosen type is found before your library empties, you don’t get a card, but you do get to order all the cards in your library any way you choose.

If your library is empty, Abundance can prevent you from losing the game for being unable to draw a card. If an effect or turn-based action would cause you to draw a card, you can replace that draw with Abundance’s replacement effect. (It doesn’t matter that you’d be unable to actually draw a card.) Since Abundance’s effect has you put a card into your hand instead of drawing a card, you’ll never be forced to draw a card with an empty library.

foreignData.name: 豊穣
foreignData.text: あなたがカードを１枚引くなら、代わりにあなたは土地か土地でないかを選んでもよい。そうしたなら、選んだ種類のカードが公開されるまで、あなたのライブラリーの一番上からカードを１枚ずつ公開する。そのカードをあなたの手札に加え、これにより公開された他のすべてのカードを望む順番であなたのライブラリーの一番下に置く。

cards.name: Oran-Rief Hydra
cards.text:
Trample
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Oran-Rief Hydra. If that land is a Forest, put two +1/+1 counters on Oran-Rief Hydra instead.

rulings.text: A landfall ability triggers whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control for any reason. It triggers whenever you play a land, as well as whenever a spell or ability puts a land onto the battlefield under your control.

When a land enters the battlefield under your control, each landfall ability of the permanents you control will trigger. You can put them on the stack in any order. The last ability you put on the stack will be the first one to resolve.

If the ability has an additional or replacement effect that depends on the land having a certain basic land type, the ability will check that land’s type as the ability resolves. If, at that time, the land that entered the battlefield is no longer on the battlefield, use its types when it left the battlefield to determine what happens.

When a land enters the battlefield under your control, each landfall ability of the permanents you control will trigger. You can put them on the stack in any order. The last ability you put on the stack will be the first one to resolve.

cards.name: Walker of the Grove
cards.text:
When Walker of the Grove leaves the battlefield, create a 4/4 green Elemental creature token.
Evoke {4}{G} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

rulings.text: Evoke doesn’t change the timing of when you can cast the creature that has it. If you could cast that creature spell only when you could cast a sorcery, the same is true for cast it with evoke.

If a creature spell cast with evoke changes controllers before it enters the battlefield, it will still be sacrificed when it enters the battlefield. Similarly, if a creature cast with evoke changes controllers after it enters the battlefield but before its sacrifice ability resolves, it will still be sacrificed. In both cases, the controller of the creature at the time it left the battlefield will control its leaves-the-battlefield ability.
When you cast a spell by paying its evoke cost, its mana cost doesn’t change. You just pay the evoke cost instead.

Effects that cause you to pay more or less to cast a spell will cause you to pay that much more or less while casting it for its evoke cost, too. That’s because they affect the total cost of the spell, not its mana cost.

Whether evoke’s sacrifice ability triggers when the creature enters the battlefield depends on whether the spell’s controller chose to pay the evoke cost, not whether they actually paid it (if it was reduced or otherwise altered by another ability, for example).
If you’re casting a spell “without paying its mana cost,” you can’t use its evoke ability.

foreignData.text:
肥沃な茂みはタップ状態で戦場に出る。
肥沃な茂みが戦場に出たとき、あなたはあなたのライブラリーの一番上からカードを５枚見てもよい。そうしたなら、その中の基本土地・カード最大１枚を公開し、そのカードをあなたのライブラリーの一番上に、残りを一番下に望む順番で置く。
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{G}を加える。

cards.name: Khalni Garden
cards.text:
Khalni Garden enters the battlefield tapped.
When Khalni Garden enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 green Plant creature token.
{T}: Add {G}.

foreignData.name: カルニの庭
foreignData.text:
カルニの庭はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
カルニの庭が戦場に出たとき、緑の０/１の植物・クリーチャー・トークンを１体戦場に出す。
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{G}を加える。

cards.name: Mosswort Bridge
cards.text:
Hideaway 4 (When this land enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)
Mosswort Bridge enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G}.
{G}, {T}: You may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost if creatures you control have total power 10 or greater.

foreignData.name: 苔汁の橋
foreignData.text:
秘匿（この土地はタップ状態で戦場に出る。そうしたとき、あなたのライブラリーの一番上からカードを４枚見て、そのうち１枚を裏向きで追放し、残りをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に置く。）
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{G}を加える。
{G}, {T}：あなたがコントロールするクリーチャーのパワーの合計が10以上であるなら、あなたはその追放されたカードを、それのマナ・コストを支払うことなくプレイしてもよい。

cards.name: Treetop Village
cards.text:
Treetop Village enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G}.
{1}{G}: Treetop Village becomes a 3/3 green Ape creature with trample until end of turn. It's still a land. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

rulings.text: A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn’t matter how long the permanent has been a creature.

Activating the ability that turns it into a creature while it’s already a creature will override any effects that set its power and/or toughness to a specific number. However, any effect that raises or lowers power and/or toughness (such as the effect created by Giant Growth, Glorious Anthem, or a +1/+1 counter) will continue to apply.

foreignData.name: 樹上の村
foreignData.text:
樹上の村はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{G}を加える。
{1}{G}：ターン終了時まで、樹上の村はトランプルを持つ緑の３/３の類人猿・クリーチャーになる。これは土地でもある。

cards.name: Ob Nixilis Reignited
cards.text:
[+1]: You draw a card and you lose 1 life.
[−3]: Destroy target creature.
[−8]: Target opponent gets an emblem with "Whenever a player draws a card, you lose 2 life."

rulings.text: The emblem created by Ob Nixilis Reignited’s last ability is both owned and controlled by the target opponent. In a multiplayer game, if you own Ob Nixilis Reignited and use him to give one of your opponents an emblem, the emblem remains even if you leave the game.

foreignData.name: 灯の再覚醒、オブ・ニクシリス
foreignData.text:
＋１：あなたはカードを１枚引き、あなたは１点のライフを失う。
－３：クリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを破壊する。
－８：対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは「プレイヤー１人がカードを１枚引くたび、あなたは２点のライフを失う。」を持つ紋章を得る。
foreignData.type: プレインズウォーカー — ニクシリス

cards.name: Altar's Reap
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Draw two cards.
cards.flavorText:
"I will secure my revenge on Zendikar one soul at a time."
—Ob Nixilis

foreignData.flavorText:
「我はゼンディカーで復讐を遂げる。１人ずつ確実に。」
――オブ・ニクシリス
foreignData.name: 祭壇の刈り取り
foreignData.text:
祭壇の刈り取りを唱えるための追加コストとして、クリーチャー１体を生け贄に捧げる。
カードを２枚引く。

cards.name: Ambition's Cost
cards.text: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.
cards.flavorText:
"Conquering your first world is the hardest, after all. My power grew as I moved from world to world, taking anything that would make the next taking easier."
—Ob Nixilis

foreignData.flavorText:
「つまるところ最初の世界の征服が最も困難である。他の世界へと移り、次の征服をより容易にするものを手に入れていくことで、我の力は増大していった。」
――オブ・ニクシリス
foreignData.name: 野望の代償
foreignData.text: あなたはカードを３枚引き、あなたは３点のライフを失う。

cards.name: Bala Ged Scorpion
cards.text: When Bala Ged Scorpion enters the battlefield, you may destroy target creature with power 1 or less.
cards.flavorText: Fast and lethal, with a penchant for the weak and infirm.

rulings.text: The power of the targeted creature is checked both as you target it and as the ability resolves.

foreignData.flavorText: 素早く致命的で、好物は弱く衰えた者だ。
foreignData.name: バーラ・ゲドの蠍
foreignData.text: バーラ・ゲドの蠍が戦場に出たとき、パワーが１以下のクリーチャー１体を対象とする。あなたはそれを破壊してもよい。

cards.name: Blistergrub
cards.text:
Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
When Blistergrub dies, each opponent loses 2 life.
cards.flavorText:
"Avoid anything that scuttles, scrabbles, or shambles."
—Opar, veteran guide

foreignData.flavorText:
「這い回るもの、よじ登るもの、徘徊するものは全て避けよ。」
――老練の案内人、オパル
foreignData.name: 水膨れ地掘り
foreignData.text:
沼渡り（このクリーチャーは防御プレイヤーが沼をコントロールしているかぎりブロックされない。）
水膨れ地掘りが死亡したとき、各対戦相手はそれぞれ２点のライフを失う。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ホラー

cards.name: Cadaver Imp
cards.text:
Flying
When Cadaver Imp enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavorText: The mouth must be pried open before rigor mortis sets in. Otherwise the returning soul can find no ingress.

foreignData.flavorText: 死後硬直が始まる前に、口を梃子で開けておかなければいけない。そうしなければ、戻ってきた魂の入り口が見つからなくなる。
foreignData.name: 死者のインプ
foreignData.text:
飛行
死者のインプが戦場に出たとき、あなたの墓地からクリーチャー・カード１枚を対象とする。あなたはそれをあなたの手札に戻してもよい。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — インプ

cards.name: Carrier Thrall
cards.text: When Carrier Thrall dies, create a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."
cards.flavorText:
"Later we will mourn those we have lost. First we must end their suffering."
—Drana, Kalastria bloodchief

rulings.text: Eldrazi Scions are similar to Eldrazi Spawn, seen in the Zendikar block. Note that Eldrazi Scions are 1/1, not 0/1.
Eldrazi and Scion are each separate creature types. Anything that affects Eldrazi will affect these tokens, for example.
Sacrificing an Eldrazi Scion creature token to add {C} to your mana pool is a mana ability. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to.

Some instants and sorceries that create Eldrazi Scions require targets. If all targets for such a spell have become illegal by the time that spell tries to resolve, the spell won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won’t get any Eldrazi Scions.

foreignData.flavorText:
「亡くした者を嘆くのは後。彼らの苦痛を終わらせるのが先です。」
――カラストリアの血の長、ドラーナ
foreignData.name: 捕らわれの宿主
foreignData.text: 捕らわれの宿主が死亡したとき、無色の１/１のエルドラージ・末裔・クリーチャー・トークンを１体戦場に出す。それは「このクリーチャーを生け贄に捧げる：あなたのマナ・プールに{C}を加える。」を持つ。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 吸血鬼

cards.name: Demon's Grasp
cards.text: Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.
cards.flavorText:
"Take what solace you can in the knowledge that you will not be here to witness Zendikar's demise."
—Ob Nixilis

foreignData.flavorText:
「ゼンディカーが終焉を迎えるとき、お前はもうこの世にいない。それをせめてもの慰めとするがいい。」
――オブ・ニクシリス
foreignData.name: 悪魔の掌握
foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは－５/－５の修整を受ける。

cards.name: Desecration Demon
cards.text:
Flying
At the beginning of each combat, any opponent may sacrifice a creature. If a player does, tap Desecration Demon and put a +1/+1 counter on it.

rulings.text: Players won’t know which player or planeswalker Desecration Demon will attack, if any, when deciding whether to sacrifice a creature.

Each opponent in turn order may choose to sacrifice a creature, even if an opponent already chose to sacrifice a creature that combat. Desecration Demon will have a maximum of one +1/+1 counter put on it each combat, no matter how many creatures were sacrificed.

foreignData.name: 冒涜の悪魔
foreignData.text:
飛行
各戦闘の開始時に、いずれの対戦相手もクリーチャー１体を生け贄に捧げてもよい。いずれかのプレイヤーがそうしたなら、冒涜の悪魔をタップし、これの上に＋１/＋１カウンターを１個置く。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — デーモン

cards.name: Despoiler of Souls
cards.text:
Despoiler of Souls can't block.
{B}{B}, Exile two other creature cards from your graveyard: Return Despoiler of Souls from your graveyard to the battlefield.
cards.flavorText: Rats and vultures devour. It desecrates.

foreignData.flavorText: 鼠と禿鷹は喰らうが、これは穢す。
foreignData.name: 魂の略奪者
foreignData.text:
魂の略奪者ではブロックできない。
{B}{B}, あなたの墓地から他のクリーチャー・カード２枚を追放する：あなたの墓地から魂の略奪者を戦場に戻す。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ホラー

cards.name: Disfigure
cards.text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
cards.flavorText: "Brave scar or unfortunate tale? It all depends on your pain threshold."

foreignData.flavorText: 「勇敢さの名残り傷か、不幸な物語か？全部お前の痛みの限界にかかっているのさ。」
foreignData.name: 見栄え損ない
foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とする。それはターン終了時まで－２/－２の修整を受ける。

cards.name: Doom Blade
cards.text: Destroy target nonblack creature.
cards.flavorText:
"One little word was all it took. The world shook as I said it. The doom of Zendikar was here at last."
—Ob Nixilis

foreignData.flavorText:
「たったの一言で事足りた。その一言に世界が揺らいだ。ついにゼンディカーに破滅が到来したのだ。」
――オブ・ニクシリス
foreignData.name: 破滅の刃
foreignData.text: 黒でないクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを破壊する。

cards.name: Fetid Imp
cards.text:
Flying
{B}: Fetid Imp gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

foreignData.name: 異臭のインプ
foreignData.text:
飛行
{B}：ターン終了時まで、異臭のインプは接死を得る。（これが何らかのダメージをクリーチャーに与えたら、それだけで破壊する。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — インプ

cards.name: Foul Imp
cards.text:
Flying
When Foul Imp enters the battlefield, you lose 2 life.
cards.flavorText: The imp, unaware of its own odor, paused to catch its breath . . . and promptly died.

rulings.text: You can cast this if you have less than 2 life, since the life is lost as an effect and not a payment.

foreignData.flavorText: インプは自分の体臭には気がついていないので、元気を取り戻すために立ち止まって息を深く吸い込んだ……。そしてたちまち死んでしまった。
foreignData.name: 悪臭のインプ
foreignData.text:
飛行
悪臭のインプが戦場に出たとき、あなたは２点のライフを失う。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — インプ

cards.name: Giant Scorpion
cards.text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
cards.flavorText: Its sting hurts, but death is strangely painless.

foreignData.flavorText: 刺されれば痛むが、死は奇妙なほどに痛みを伴わない。
foreignData.name: 巨大蠍
foreignData.text: 接死（これが何らかのダメージをクリーチャーに与えたら、それだけで破壊する。）

cards.name: Grim Discovery
cards.text:
Choose one or both —
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Return target land card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavorText: Few among the living understand just how much of their world is shaped by the ruins of the dead.

foreignData.flavorText: 自分たちの世界がどれほどの死者の積み重ねで形づくられているか、命ある者の中にそれを知る者はほとんどいない。
foreignData.name: 不気味な発見
foreignData.text:
以下から１つまたは両方を選ぶ。
• あなたの墓地からクリーチャー・カード１枚を対象とし、それをあなたの手札に戻す。
• あなたの墓地から土地・カード１枚を対象とし、それをあなたの手札に戻す。

cards.name: Hideous End
cards.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. Its controller loses 2 life.
cards.flavorText:
"A little dark magic won't stop me. The worse the curse, the better the prize."
—Radavi, Joraga relic hunter, last words

rulings.text: If the targeted creature is an illegal target by the time Hideous End resolves, the entire spell doesn’t resolve. No one loses life.

foreignData.flavorText:
「ちょっとした黒魔法じゃ止められないよ。呪いが酷ければ、それだけ得るものも大きいんだ。」
――ジョラーガの遺物狩り、ラダーヴィの最後の言葉
foreignData.name: 忌まわしい最期
foreignData.text: 黒でないクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを破壊する。それのコントローラーは２点のライフを失う。

cards.name: Indulgent Tormentor
cards.text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card unless target opponent sacrifices a creature or pays 3 life.
cards.flavorText: The promise of anguish is payment enough for services rendered.

rulings.text: The opponent chooses whether they sacrifice a creature, pays 3 life, or allows you to draw a card. That player can’t make an impossible choice, such as sacrificing a creature while they control no creatures.

If there are no legal targets to choose, perhaps because all your opponents have hexproof, the ability is removed from the stack with no effect. You won’t draw a card. This is also true if the target opponent becomes an illegal target in response to the ability.

foreignData.flavorText: 提供した奉仕の対価として、苦悩の約束は十分すぎるほどである。
foreignData.name: 寛大な拷問者
foreignData.text:
飛行
あなたのアップキープの開始時に、対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーがクリーチャー１体を生け贄に捧げるか３点のライフを支払わないかぎり、あなたはカードを１枚引く。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — デーモン

cards.name: Innocent Blood
cards.text: Each player sacrifices a creature.
cards.flavorText: Zombies mourn for the living and celebrate those who will soon be given the gift of death.

rulings.text: You can cast Innocent Blood even if some (or all) players control no creatures. Those players are simply unaffected.

foreignData.flavorText: ゾンビどもは生きている者を哀悼し、死にゆく者を祝賀するんだよ。
foreignData.name: 無垢の血
foreignData.text: 各プレイヤーはそれぞれクリーチャー１体を生け贄に捧げる。

cards.name: Mire's Toll
cards.text: Target player reveals a number of cards from their hand equal to the number of Swamps you control. You choose one of them. That player discards that card.
cards.flavorText: As the bridge snapped, Berko was sure he heard the swamp laughing at him.

rulings.text: If the number of Swamps you control exceeds the number of cards in the targeted player’s hand, that player reveals all the cards in their hand.

foreignData.flavorText: 橋が折れたとき、ベルコは確かに沼が笑うのを聞いた。
foreignData.name: ぬかるみの代価
foreignData.text: プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは自分の手札から、あなたがコントロールする沼の総数に等しい枚数のカードを公開する。あなたはそのうちの１枚を選ぶ。そのプレイヤーはそのカードを捨てる。

cards.name: Pestilence Demon
cards.text:
Flying
{B}: Pestilence Demon deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
cards.flavorText: "I have schemed too long to be supplanted by dead gods. If I cannot have this world, no one can."

rulings.text: Pestilence Demon deals 1 damage to itself, as well as to each other creature and each player.

foreignData.flavorText: 「我は死の神の策謀に、長くその座を奪われていた。我が手に入らぬ世界なら、誰の手にも入れぬ。」
foreignData.name: 黒死病の悪魔
foreignData.text:
飛行
{B}：黒死病の悪魔は各クリーチャーと各プレイヤーにそれぞれ１点のダメージを与える。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — デーモン

cards.name: Priest of the Blood Rite
cards.text:
When Priest of the Blood Rite enters the battlefield, create a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 2 life.
cards.flavorText: Some will sacrifice everything for but a taste of power.

foreignData.flavorText: 力を味わうためだけに、すべてを犠牲にする者もいる。
foreignData.name: 血の儀式の司祭
foreignData.text:
血の儀式の司祭が戦場に出たとき、飛行を持つ黒の５/５のデーモン・クリーチャー・トークンを１体戦場に出す。
あなたのアップキープの開始時に、あなたは２点のライフを失う。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・クレリック

cards.name: Quest for the Gravelord
cards.text:
Whenever a creature dies, you may put a quest counter on Quest for the Gravelord.
Remove three quest counters from Quest for the Gravelord and sacrifice it: Create a 5/5 black Zombie Giant creature token.

rulings.text: Quest for the Gravelord’s first ability triggers regardless of who controlled the creature and whose graveyard it was put into.

foreignData.name: 墓所王の探索
foreignData.text:
クリーチャーが１体死亡するたび、あなたは墓所王の探索の上に探索カウンターを１個置いてもよい。
墓所王の探索の上から探索カウンターを３個取り除くとともにこれを生け贄に捧げる：黒の５/５のゾンビ・巨人・クリーチャー・トークンを１体戦場に出す。

cards.name: Renegade Demon
cards.flavorText: Confront it at your own peril, for it will confront you for its own amusement.

foreignData.flavorText: やつにとってお前は娯楽でしかない。立ち向かうのなら危険を覚悟することだ。
foreignData.name: 反逆の悪魔
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — デーモン

cards.name: Shadows of the Past
cards.text:
Whenever a creature dies, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
{4}{B}: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. Activate only if there are four or more creature cards in your graveyard.

rulings.text: Once you legally activate the last ability, it doesn’t matter how many creature cards are in your graveyard as it resolves.

foreignData.name: 過去の過ち
foreignData.text:
クリーチャーが１体死亡するたび、占術１を行う。（あなたのライブラリーの一番上のカードを見る。あなたはそのカードをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に置いてもよい。）
{4}{B}：各対戦相手はそれぞれ２点のライフを失い、あなたは２点のライフを得る。この能力は、あなたの墓地にクリーチャー・カードが４枚以上あるときにのみ起動できる。

cards.name: Smallpox
cards.text: Each player loses 1 life, discards a card, sacrifices a creature, then sacrifices a land.
cards.flavorText: Take away a few things, and a rebellion may ensue. Take away everything, and the oppression will be accepted as fate.

rulings.text: As Smallpox resolves, first each player loses 1 life at the same time. Next, each player chooses a card in hand without revealing it, then all of the cards are discarded at the same time. Then starting with the player whose turn it is and proceeding in turn order, each player chooses a creature, knowing the choices made before them. All of the creatures are sacrificed at the same time, then finally repeat this process for lands.
Any abilities that trigger while Smallpox is resolving will wait to be put onto the stack until Smallpox is done resolving.

Any abilities of the lands sacrificed may modify or trigger on the creatures being sacrificed and on the cards being discarded. Abilities of the creatures won’t modify or trigger on the lands being sacrificed, but may modify or trigger on the cards being discarded.

foreignData.flavorText: 幾ばくかを取り去れば、反逆が起こりえる。全てを取り去れば、抑圧も宿命として受け入れられる。
foreignData.name: 小悪疫
foreignData.text: 各プレイヤーはそれぞれ、１点のライフを失い、カード１枚を捨て、クリーチャー１体を生け贄に捧げ、土地１つを生け贄に捧げる。

cards.name: Squelching Leeches
cards.text: Squelching Leeches's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.
cards.flavorText: Setting foot in their muck is an open invitation.

rulings.text: Squelching Leeches's power and toughness will change as the number of Swamps you control changes. Its ability counts all lands you control with the subtype Swamp, not just those named Swamp.
The ability that defines Squelching Leeches's power and toughness works in all zones, not just the battlefield.

foreignData.flavorText: あのぬかるみに足を踏み入れるのは「ご自由にお召し上がりください」と言うようなものだ。
foreignData.name: 押し潰すヒル
foreignData.text: 押し潰すヒルのパワーとタフネスは、それぞれあなたがコントロールする沼の総数に等しい。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ヒル

cards.name: Tendrils of Corruption
cards.text: Tendrils of Corruption deals X damage to target creature and you gain X life, where X is the number of Swamps you control.
cards.flavorText: Darkness doesn't always send its minions to do its dirty work.

rulings.text: If the target creature is an illegal target by the time Tendrils of Corruption tries to resolve, the spell doesn’t resolve. You don’t gain X life.

foreignData.flavorText: 闇が穢れた仕事を行うとき、送り込んでくるのは手先ばかりとは限らない。
foreignData.name: 堕落の触手
foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とする。堕落の触手はそれにＸ点のダメージを与え、あなたはＸ点のライフを得る。Ｘはあなたがコントロールする沼の総数に等しい。

cards.name: Unhallowed Pact
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control.
cards.flavorText: Agreements with demons seldom end at the grave.

rulings.text: The card will return to the battlefield under your control only if it’s still in the graveyard when Unhallowed Pact’s ability resolves. If it’s not (perhaps because an ability like undying has already returned it to the battlefield), nothing happens.
If Unhallowed Pact is enchanting a token creature, that creature can’t return to the battlefield.

foreignData.flavorText: 悪魔との契約が墓場で終わることは滅多にない。
foreignData.name: 不浄の契約
foreignData.text:
エンチャント（クリーチャー）
エンチャントされているクリーチャーが死亡したとき、そのカードをあなたのコントロール下で戦場に戻す。
foreignData.type: エンチャント — オーラ
